AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Delyn potter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Potter's Hall of the St. Delyn canton. Admittedly the pay wasn't great, but the bed was cheap, and [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Delyn glassworker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Glassworker's Hall of the St. Delyn canton. [PAWN_nameDef] was a bit annoyed when [PAWN_pronoun] realised they meant that kind of glass, but that did explain the pay, and [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't going to turn down the work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms tailor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tailors and Dyers Hall of the St. Olms canton. Days were varied enough, some days shirts, other days pants, maybe even some gloves thrown in there. But [PAWN_nameDef] did eventually grow tired of it, and decided to move on.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms dyer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tailors and Dyers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed working with all the dyes, in all their different colours, although there were a few colours [PAWN_nameDef] didn't much care for.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms brewer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Brewers and Fishmongers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_pronoun] always questioned why the brewers and fishmongers had to share a hall, what with the constant smell of fish tainting the alcohol.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms fishmonger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Brewers and Fishmongers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_nameDef] looked forward to every day, mostly because [PAWN_pronoun] always knew there was a jug of sujamma with [PAWN_possessive] name on it, just a few steps away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms tanner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tanners and Miners Hall of the St. Olms canton. Tanning hides was tiring and monotonous work, but conversations with the miners helped [PAWN_nameDef] through each day. [PAWN_nameDef] even picked up a few tricks from them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tanners and Miners Hall of the St. Olms canton. When [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't working tirelessly in the mines, [PAWN_pronoun] could be found in the Hall, tending to the counter, or sometimes sharing tips with the tanners.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Farmers and Labourers Hall of the St. Olms canton. While [PAWN_nameDef] occasionally helped out in the fields, most days were spent in the Hall itself, ensuring the shop was well stocked, and completing orders.
